name: Muropaketti.com  & Taskumuro.com (version 2011)
description:
Style for Muropaketti.com & Taskumuro.com (2011 version). 

Features : 
- Removes ads 
- Wider news section
- Cleans the sidebar
- Better image controlling in news
- Smaller article link box
additional_info:
Version 1.01 : 
       * Bug fixes
       * Login box visible
       * One style for muropaketti & taskumuro

Version 1.00 : 
       * Initial version
